quote: Shadow crawled across the floor to the yellow foam-rubber pad and climbed onto it, pulling the thin blanket over himself, and closed his eyes, and he held onto nothing, and he held onto dreams.
quote_letters: SHADOW CRAWLED ACROSS THE FLOOR TO THE YELLOW FOAM-RUBBER PAD AND CLIMBED ONTO IT PULLING THE THIN BLANKET OVER HIMSELF AND CLOSED HIS EYES AND HE HELD ONTO NOTHING AND HE HELD ONTO DREAMS
